snippet: Chinese President Xi Jinping urged "decisive actions" against "terrorists" after an attack at a train station in the restive far western region of Xinjiang killed three people, state news agency Xinhua said on Thursday....

headline.print_headline: China President Urges 'Decisive Actions' After Xinjiang Attack
headline.main: China President Urges 'Decisive Actions' After Xinjiang Attack

lead_paragraph: Chinese President Xi Jinping urged "decisive actions" against "terrorists" after an attack at a train station in the restive far western region of Xinjiang killed three people, state news agency Xinhua said on Thursday.
